channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7568] [replication] Create an interface for replication queues
item.summary: [replication] Create an interface for replication queues

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I will post a patch shortly. I'll also post an overall diagram (check HBASE-7564) of how the class structure works in my refactoring.

Attached is a first patch for trunk that refactors the queues part of replication state management. All replication related tests pass locally. I will also post this up on review board.

Here are some things that happened in the patch:

  • Split all replication state management relating to queues into ReplicationQueues and ReplicationQueuesClient interfaces. Also created associated implementation classes.
  • Modified ReplicationLogCleaner to use appropriate interfaces instead of ReplicationZookeeper.

Things left to do (I will create separate sub-tasks under HBASE-7564 for each of these):

  • Split peers logic out. (HBASE-7567)
  • Refactor the KeeperException (if possible) into a ReplicationException, so Zookeeper is not leaking through the new interfaces.
  • Remove the ReplicationZooKeeper class.

I will also post a doc with the overall class structure on HBASE-7564.

Thanks!

Review posted: https://reviews.apache.org/r/9987/
Doc posted as well.
Submitting patch for a qa run.
Renaming patch file so hadoopqa will pick it up.
From https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/4871/console, it looks like the patch doesn't compile (against hadoop 2.0, at least)

Hmm, it compiled locally. Will investigate. Thanks Ted.

Chris
Woops. Posted the wrong file when I renamed it.
Attached re-based patch to incorporate new test in TestReplicationSourceManager.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment

against trunk revision .

New trunk patch attached:

  • Re-based patch.
  • Changed names of Impl classes to indicate they are the Zookeeper implementation.
  • Added tests around ReplicationQueues and ReplicationQueuesClient interfaces.

I'll update the RB review as well.

All three test clases:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.constraint.TestConstraint
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TestTableLockManager
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestHFileOutputFormat

pass locally and seem to be flapping for unrelated reasons.
Patch looks good to me. Jean-Daniel Cryans Anything you see wrong w/ where our Chris cut the Interface? Looks clean to me. Lets get it in.

+1 on the patch, thank you Chris for adding the tests and changing the class names.

On or after commit, it seems that we should create a follow-up jira for the TODOs in TestReplicationStateBasic.

Sounds good. I can create the jira.

Thanks Stack and Jean-Daniel Cryans for the review! I'll have the peers interface soon as well.
Committed to trunk and 0.95 branch. Thanks for patch Chris.
